attributes.action: The British people have no confidence in Her Majesty's Current Tory Government
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like to see a motion of no confidence vote to be held in parliment as we the people have no confidence in the current Tory party to lead this country.
attributes.background: Taking into account recent events here in the UK with regards to the EU referendum, the resignation of David Cameron, the lack of action to invoke Article 50 and the tory leadership elections. We the undersigned would like to see a motion of no confidence vote to be held in parliment.
